attributes.action: cause any nation in receipt of financial or other types of assistance to freely allow the promotion of Christian values such as tolerance, charity and the subsequent religious message of Jesus Christ.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently the British government is providing vast amounts of financial and other aid to countries where Christians are being severely persecuted. India and Pakistan are good examples where hundreds of millions of pounds have been given this year alone. This petition believes that those who accept our aid must respect our Christian religion and protect Christians within their country. Britain affords Muslims and Hindus the right of tolerance and free speech therefore our British government ought to demand the same from countries in receipt of our generous help.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
